pages.text:
Golf Event Hosting
At Victoria Hills Golf Club, we recognize that each golf outing, golf tournament, and golf event is unique and will have different needs. We will never try to fit you into a “cookie cutter” event package. We will design your day and organize our staff around your needs. We believe that the most important aspect of planning and coordinating an event is the assurance of first-class service and the significance of hosting a wonderfully unique, enjoyable event that each and every guest will remember for years to come.
The following services are provided at no charge:
Personalized Scorecards
Cart Assignment and Pairings
Tournament Scoring/Leaderboard
Registration Area
Food and Beverage Services
We will gladly offer assistance with:
Fundraising Ideas and Suggestions
Hole-in-One Insurance
Sponsor Signs
Corporate or Tournament Logo Merchandise and Prizes
Whether you are planning a corporate golf event, fundraising, or just getting the gang back together, let us be your professional golf tournament planner. Your guests’ satisfaction is our absolute priority!
Golf Event Hosting Request

Membership Information
Join Victoria Hills
With so much to offer, Victoria Hills Golf Club has been consistently named one of the Top Courses You Can Play in Florida by Golfweek Magazine. This Ron Garl design was carefully built to pronounce the natural flow of the area’s rolling hills and foliage, while also providing golfers with challenges. It’s hard to imagine a more serene environment to play your best golf. This beautiful 18-hole, par-72 golf course is surrounded by hundreds of oak hammocks and Augusta pines, and is buffered by pristine lakes and flowering greens. The views that a golfer experiences at Victoria Hills Golf Club are stunning, and the challenging course tests ones skills throughout all eighteen holes.
Unlimited Greens Fees
Tee Times up to 14 Days in Advance
Men’s and Ladies’ Golf Leagues
Active Event Calendar and Social Functions
Guest of Member Rate for Guests
Charging Account
10% off Non-Discounted Items in Pro Shops and Restaurants
